text: Alexander Niklas Meyer-Schade (born 13 April 1991) is a German footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Jahn Regensburg. ==Career== In August 2017, Meyer joined Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart. After not making a first team appearance in two seasons, he joined second-division club Jahn Regensburg in 2019. He made his professional debut for Regensburg in the 2. Bundesliga on 28 July 2019, starting in the home match against VfL Bochum. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at DFB.de * Profile at kicker.de Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bad Oldesloe Category:Footballers from Schleswig-Holstein Category:German footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Hamburger SV II players Category:TSV Havelse players Category:FC Energie Cottbus players Category:VfB Stuttgart players Category:VfB Stuttgart II players Category:SSV Jahn Regensburg players Category:2. Bundesliga players Category:Regionalliga players
title: Alexander Meyer (footballer, born 1991)
